document_title: Breast enlargement: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
The exact cause has not yet been confirmed, there are a number of theories including:
Abnormal increase in hormone levels (Estrogen, Prolactin) or increased body sensitivity to endocrine glands; The concentration of growth hormone secreted exceeds the necessary threshold, stimulating the development of epidermal tissue in the breast.; Increased proliferation of adipose tissue, breast tissue or mammary gland tissue due to lifestyle habits or genetics.; Other factors: pregnancy, stress, obesity, premenopause...
